name: My Little World (AlejoBerg)
description:
Hi there! Check out this game made by me in 3 days.

The main purpose of this was practising some design patterns and at the same time be able to make a smooth pokemon style world with npc interaction and also a skin shop.

Everything was coded by me.

Controls:

W-A-S-D --> Movement

Left Click --> Close dialogue

E --> Interaction

Design Patterns used:

- Strategy

- Type Object

- Prototype

- Facade

- Observer

What do you think?  Leave a comment.

Hope you like it!
